The COVID-19 vaccines are good news for protecting people, but properly wearing a mask that covers your nose and mouth continues to be one of the best ways to stop spreading the virus. You may also want to consider wearing two masks, which can offer additional protection. https://t.co/Ux7yVxTK6w
